alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Hardeman; Haywood; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:48PM CDT until June 25 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi... Tipton County in west Tennessee... Fayette County in west Tennessee... West central Hardeman County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Haywood County in west Tennessee... Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 648 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Millington, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, West Memphis, Millington, Covington, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Whiteville, Somerville, Brighton, Dixonville, Southeast Memphis, Eads, Slayden and Mt Pleasant. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
